title: Epicmario71
author: Epicmario71
content: ðŸ“¢ Announcement: Join the BlockyFile Discord Server and Test the Future!Attention all tech enthusiasts and privacy advocates! We have an exciting update to share with you. The development of the BlockyFile software is currently 80% complete, and we're nearing a major milestone in our journey towards decentralized file storage.In just a few weeks, we will be launching the highly anticipated BlockyFile Testnet, where everyone will have the opportunity to experience the power of our groundbreaking technology firsthand. This is your chance to be among the first to explore and test the capabilities of BlockyFile!Join our vibrant and growing community on Discord to be part of this monumental event. Here's what you can look forward to:ðŸ”¹ Engage in discussions with fellow tech enthusiasts and privacy advocates.ðŸ”¹ Stay up to date with the latest progress and exciting updates about BlockyFile's development.ðŸ”¹ Participate in the Testnet and provide valuable feedback to help shape the future of decentralized file storage.ðŸ”¹ Connect with like-minded individuals who share your passion for secure and anonymous data management.ðŸ”¹ Gain exclusive insights into the features and functionalities of BlockyFile.Don't miss out on this opportunity to be at the forefront of a game-changing technology. Join our Discord server using the link below:ðŸ”— https://discord.blockyfile.org/Together, let's push the boundaries of secure file storage and redefine the way we handle data. We can't wait to see you on the Testnet and hear your thoughts on BlockyFile!Best regards,The BlockyFile TeamBlockyFile Project Details:Website: https://blockyfile.org/WhitePaper: https://blockyfile.org/pdf/WhitePaper.pdfTelegram: https://t.me/blockyfileDiscord: https://discord.blockyfile.org/

comments.author: Epicmario71
comments.body: Exciting News! We are thrilled to announce that we have just uploaded our first set of code to GitHub! This is a significant milestone in the development of our project, and we can't wait to share it with our amazing community.But that's not all! We have another exciting update for you. In the coming week, we will be announcing the official date for our highly anticipated Testnet launch!Â  Yes, you heard it right. Before the end of this month, we'll be kicking off our Testnet, where you can experience the functionality and performance of our platform firsthand.Stay tuned for the announcement of the Testnet date, as it will be shared with you very soon. We're putting in our best efforts to ensure a smooth and engaging experience for all participants.In the meantime, don't forget to check out our GitHub repository and star the project to show your support. We appreciate your enthusiasm and are grateful for your ongoing support throughout this journey.Join us on this exciting adventure as we revolutionize the world of blockyfile together! Best regards,BlockyfileÂ  Team

comments.author: lemonandfriesonetwo
comments.body: Quote from: Epicmario71 on June 11, 2023, 09:03:54 AM Exciting News! ...............Here is link: https://github.com/BlockyFile
